backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, and system configuration with storage mixins and Stripe config state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing fixes for marketing logo loading and navigation link mismatches with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/dist/.ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration defining cache headers, MIME rules, and SPA fallback behavior for deployed frontend build.
frontend/dist/index.html: Built production HTML document containing metadata, SEO tags, and references to generated assets for the deployed app.
frontend/index.html: Development HTML template with SEO tags and root div for mounting the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists the allowed Internet Computer domain names for this app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, shortcuts, and display settings.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing general crawling while disallowing some internal routes and specifying sitemap and crawl delay.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements a versioned service worker handling install, activation, and fetch with network-first navigation and cache-first asset strategies.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap defining primary EcoPowerHub.ai routes with metadata like lastmod, changefreq, priority, and language alternates.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React router, query client, and authenticated layout while defining routes for all major app pages.
frontend/src/components/AlarmNotificatio: Displays a morning alarm popup with weather, energy stats, sound playback, and text-to-speech updates.
frontend/src/components/AraChat.tsx: Provides a floating chat widget that sends user messages and returns random predefined assistant responses.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddAla: Dialog for creating a new alarm, capturing time and settings, building an AlarmConfig, and saving it through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AddSys: Dialog component for adding a new system, handling form inputs, region detection, validation, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Alarms: Displays user alarm configurations with options to add, edit, toggle, and delete alarms using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Analyt: Shows energy analytics with historical and predicted charts, domain status checks, and report download and URL copy features.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EditAl: Form dialog for editing an existing alarm, preloading its values and submitting updates through mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Energy: Renders a line chart of energy consumption and temperature data using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/EVAuth: Dialog for connecting an EV provider account, simulating OAuth and submitting mock auth data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Mainte: Displays a preview maintenance dashboard using mock data, showing system health, events, learning updates, and config settings with status helpers and a refresh action.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/MyEVCa: Shows EV telemetry, charging controls, and disconnect options, including solar charging simulation and provider-specific presentation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Aggregates system and energy data to show stats, charts, and status cards, with loading states and intro messaging when no systems exist.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Recomm: Fetches and filters AI energy recommendations, showing insights, loading skeletons, and detailed recommendation cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/System: Manages system connections and EV integrations, showing status, connect/disconnect flows, and dialogs for adding systems or authenticating EVs.
Renders cards for each system with latest energy and temperature readings or a prompt when no systems are connected.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Temper: Renders a bar chart of temperatures by location with Celsius/Fahrenheit support using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Smar: UI panel showing mock smart diagnostic data with preview notice and explanation cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding and external links to caffeine.ai and EcoPowerHub.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the site header with logo, user greeting, theme toggle, logout functionality, and responsive navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoadingErrorBoun: Displays loading, timeout, and error states with retry handling and network status awareness for wrapped content.
Renders the marketing site footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and legal links.
Provides the marketing site header with navigation, theme toggle, region/language selectors, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal that collects user name and language, auto-detects settings, and saves the profile via API.
frontend/src/components/StableImage.tsx: Image wrapper that prevents flicker by stabilizing dimensions and handling loading and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login flow, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, and various mock system/config queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, base styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/alarmService.ts: Utility for generating motivational messages, formatting alarms, playing sounds, and speaking morning updates.
frontend/src/lib/assetRestoration.ts: Defines required PNG assets with metadata and provides validation and URL helpers for build-time checks.
frontend/src/lib/generatedAssetPaths.ts: Defines a constant map of generated asset PNG paths and exports its key type.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Provides language/region config, device brand/system lists, RTL checks, temperature utilities, timestamp formatting, and regional mappings.
frontend/src/lib/weather.ts: Fetches and formats weather data from Open‑Meteo and provides a helper for obtaining user geolocation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BestPracticesPage.tsx: Renders a best‑practices guide page with sections on maintenance, inspections, and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceSecurityPag: Displays compliance and security content with print‑ready styles and a PDF‑generation workflow.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main user dashboard with tab navigation, admin controls, and personalized greeting.
Page that checks accessibility and SSL validity of specified domains and displays deployment readiness with copy-to-clipboard and UI alerts.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceIntegrationGuid: Provides detailed setup guides, privacy notes, troubleshooting steps, and benefits for various energy devices using collapsible UI sections.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Displays searchable regional electrical system data and documentation links, along with a smart diagnostics panel.
frontend/src/pages/DomainPortfolioPage.t: Shows mock domain portfolio data including availability, pricing, strategy, and recommendations for brand protection.
frontend/src/pages/EmailAutomationPage.t: Manages email automation rules with keyword matching and preset responses, allowing toggles and quick configuration.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Hero-style marketing landing page with globe background, CTA, and setup guide cards for energy devices.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login UI that triggers Internet Identity auth and highlights platform features before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingCampaignAsse: Page providing ad scripts, banner variants, and clipboard-copy tools for marketing campaign assets.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerMarketplacePag: Marketplace listing affiliate programs with details, benefits, and links for various energy and smart-home partners.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, sharing, and security practices for the platform.
frontend/src/pages/SupportIntegrationsPa: Renders the support and integrations page, fetching manufacturer support and support boundary data and displaying active content with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TechSpecsPage.tsx: Displays technical specifications including voltage compatibility, device specs, compliance standards, and SCADA protocol support.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for system configs, energy data, pricing, devices, SCADA protocols, case studies, and other frontend data models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
frontend/vite-build-verify.js: Node script that validates production build output, ensuring required files and PNG assets exist with correct dimensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, architectural notes, and known issues involving missing static assets, broken routes, and deployment mismatches. Also lists required images and existing feature references.
